answers.answer: I had swelling for 6 to 7 weeks before labor and particularly the whole last month.  It didn't happen at the last minute for me but was ongoing.  fun fun
Did your doctor tell you why???

I started swelling around 33 weeks. It can be caused by poor circulation and water retention.  Drink a lot more water to flush it out and make sure you get up and move occasionally if you are allowed to
Oh okay. Yeah I'm strict bedrest so I can't get up except to use the bathroom... :/
Only time I had swelling before labour is when I had preeclampsia. Have you been tested?

question: How long before labor did your legs and feet swell???
title: swelling before labor?
